title: Crystal Vile Shard
summaries: The Crystal Vile Shard is a Hardmode magic weapon that is an upgraded version of the Vilethorn and a precursor to the Nettle Burst. It fires a larger, colorful, crystalline version of the Vilethorn's spear projectile, piercing through blocks and enemies. It has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance to be dropped by Hallowed Mimics.
Like the Nettle Burst, the Crystal Vile Shard has 10 <linked>armor penetration</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a massive crystal spike
Ignores 10 points of enemy Defense
